data.title: SmarTone Telecommunications Holdings Ltd Executive & Employee Information
data.meta_description: GlobalData provides latest information on SmarTone Telecommunications Holdings Ltd employees, including CEO details, executives and full board of directors.
data.text:
Ms. Fiona Lau has been the Chief Executive Officer and Director of the company since February 2023. Prior to this, she served as the Director and Chief Commercial Officer of SUNeVision Holdings Ltd. from 2017 to 2023. Previously, she served as the Director of BlackRock Asset Management (North Asia) from 2010 to 2017. She also served as the Engagement Manager of McKinsey & Company from 2005 to 2010.

Mr. Stephen Chau Kam-Kun has been the Chief Technology Officer and Director of the company since 2015. Previously, he served as the Head of Operations. Mr. Chau held various senior management positions in telecommunications firms. He also serves as the Member of The Institution of Engineering and Technology (IET) and the Chartered Engineer of the Institute of Electrical Engineers, UK.

Mr. Allen Fung Yuk-lun has been the Deputy Chairman of the company since 2020. Prior to this, he served as the managing partner of McKinsey Hong Kong from 2004 to 2010. Previously, he served the McKinsey & Company (McKinsey), a global management consulting company from 1997 to 2013. Presently, he served as the Executive Director and a Member of the Executive Committee of Sun Hung Kai Properties Limited (SHKP), the Chief Executive Officer of the SHKP groupâ€™s non-property related portfolio investments.

Mr. Daniel Leung has been the Head of Business Markets of the company since 2012. Mr Leung has been in the IT and telecommunications industry for over 30 years. Prior to this, he served in senior business positions at organizations including IBM, Unisys and HGC one.

Mr. Raymond Kwok Ping-Luen has been the Chairman of the company since 1996. Presently, he served as the Managing Director and Chairman of Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd, and the Chairman and Executive Director of SUNeVision Holdings Ltd. Mr. Kwok serves as the Director of TFS Development Company Ltd, Cellular 8 Holdings Ltd, Wing Tai Properties Ltd, The Real Estate Developers Association of Hong Kong and Transport International Holdings Limited. He also serves as the Council Member of The Chinese University of Hong Kong.
